item.title: AoC 2024 Day 04: Ceres Search
item.description: Problem This word search allows words to be horizontal, vertical, diagonal, written backwards, or even overlapping other words. Here are a few ways XMAS might appear, where irrelevant characters have been replaced with .: ..X... .SAMX. .A..A. XMAS.S .X.... The actual word search will be full of letters instead. For example: MMMSXXMASM MSAMXMSMSA AMXSXMAAMM MSAMASMSMX XMASAMXAMM XXAMMXXAMA SMSMSASXSS SAXAMASAAA MAMMMXMMMM MXMXAXMASX Parsing namespace AoC2024; public partial class CeresSearch { private readonly char[,] grid; public CeresSearch(string filePath) { using StreamReader inputReader = new(filePath); List<char[]> rows = []; string?
